pageContext.claim: “China wants to make a deal, and I don't blame them, because companies are leaving China by the hundreds because they don't want to pay the tariffs.”
pageContext.analysis: Some companies are considering relocating away from China, but financial analysts say those decisions in many cases predated Trump's tariffs. "Rising labor costs have been driving factory emigration from China since long before Washington’s tariffs were a factor," as Fortune magazine reported in June 2019.
